column2: "I've been wondering what connection there could possibly be between ARKS and that rampaging dragon."
"It would be nice if I actually had a chance to rest and get my thoughts in order."
"But one thing I can't get out of my head is if ARKS is truly justice or not."
"What can be defined as justice to begin with?"
"Defeating Darkers, is that justice? Defeating more Darkers, is that more justice?"
"Seems like quite a narrow point of view, don't you think? Almost suspicious even."
"Forget I said anything. In this organization, gathering information draws unwanted attention."
"Though, I think your actions could be called justice. Others think so as well."
"However, not everyone shares that point of view, so watch yourself."
